00022 #include <GisCommon.h>
00023 #include <common/Io/ObjectStreamReader.h>
00024 
00025 /// \brief
00026 /// GisIoObjectStreamReader is the template for all
00027 /// readers on GisIoStream. Readers for various sized objects
00028 /// or primitive types can be based on this class.
00029 class GisIoByteStreamReader : public GisIoObjectStreamReader<GisByte> 
00030 {
00031 public:
00032 
00033     /// \brief
00034     /// Creates a Byte Stream reader. Reads binary data from
00035     /// a GisIoStream
00036     /// 
00037     /// \param stream 
00038     /// Input the stream to read from
00039     /// 
00040     /// \return
00041     /// Returns GisIoByteStreamReader
00042     /// 
00043     GIS_API static GisIoByteStreamReader* Create( GisIoStream* stream );
00044     
00045     /// \return
00046     /// Returns GisStreamReaderType_Byte
00047     /// 
00048     GIS_API virtual GisStreamReaderType GetType();
00049 
00050 protected:
00051 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00052     GisIoByteStreamReader();
00053     GisIoByteStreamReader( GisIoStream* stream );
00054 /// \endcond
00055 
00056     GIS_API virtual void Dispose();
00057 
00058 };
00059 
00060 /// \brief
00061 /// GisIoByteStreamReaderP is a GisPtr on GisIoByteStreamReader, provided for convenience.
00062 typedef GisPtr<GisIoByteStreamReader> GisIoByteStreamReaderP;
